data.message: I've been a huge rap/hip hop fan since it's birth in the late 80s.  I'm just an old white woman (not that old) in  your old stomping ground, St. Joseph, MO.  My man, you are the King.  The Recovery album literally helped save my son's life. I'm ready for a new drop.  Keep it coming, Mr. Mathers...we need you!

replies.message: I bet that eminem is glad he is helping your son.
Recovery helped save me as well
#Respect✌
I was in a place where "No Love " became my anthem.

I'm only 22 years old, but the impact that Em' is having on my life is immense..,it's like every single song of his tells a story about the way i am and how i live my live..,and for that i thank him..,#TrueLegend🙌👌☝💯
i am an old woman lol and i still think he is awesome
Maaaannnn, if you like the new skool eminem, listen to the old skool. Million times better.
That's what is great about Eminem, he spits real shit that many people can relate to. He shares his hard times and that helps other get through their hard times.
Hey Niek Bosma I've been an Eminem fan since Slim Shady.

Niek Bosma his new stuff is great, his old stuff is great. His older stuff wasn't as serious or deep as it got to after about relapse, because he is off his drugs. The music has always been relatable in so many ways, but going as far to say it's "that much better" is a bit far
Umm it was out a while longer than the late 80s.
I get that, but it didn't hit shithole, MO till about 84, 85.
Michelle Fitzpatrick - me too. "No Love" was my mantra while going through a shitty divorce. Still love that song
Eminem show is where he started to go to shit.
https://youtu.be/ML1OHas7X1c

back when I was a kid I heard I'm the real slim shady so it was the music I grew up with, I never thought I would end up making music, inspired by 80's horror movies such as fright night and nightmare on elm street I made this song called silver bullet, as I write this, this is its official release date 2017, I hope you enjoy.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NcIkkkU_8Ys
Hey jonathan jerome Jonathan Jerome Behzad...GO FUCK YOURSELF
Devery R. Hamilton yes

Yo sigo diciendo que al escucharlo te ase entender que el vino desde abajo el le sufrio y lo que quiere es que tu entiendas que esta vida no es facil para nadie, con el simple hecho de solo mirar los videos de su vida pasada cuando estaba su hija pequeña , los problemas que tenia con su madre, con la que fue su esposa, tantas cosas y aparte su carrera de cantante que no fue nada facil peor todavia lo que el vivio y eso te ase entender, que la vida es muy dura pareciera que es cruel.
Ferdia
Shaun Fullerton eminem would kill these new peasants that call themselves rappers
